title: Tobin Zolkowski
description: Writing about data, multilingual thinking, and the intersection of technology and human experience.

items.title: When Smart Machines Meet Empty Cribs
items.summary: Will AI Singularity derail human population growth? Exploring the intersection of technological advancement and demographic trends.

items.title: The SQL Query That Queries Itself
items.summary: An analyst's guide to schema-agnostic SQL. Sometimes the most elegant solution is letting the database tell you about itself.

items.title: When Tableau Met LookML: My Brain's Identity Crisis
items.summary: Trading drag-and-drop for code taught me to think in two languages (and I survived to tell about it).

items.title: I Learned to Analyze Data More Quickly Because I Was Speaking French
items.summary: My midnight eureka moment that made my language barrier a career advantage.
